thread.section_title: Carid Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Carid | www.carid.com | 4 of 32
thread.title: Mary Leigh

author: Mary Leigh
title: Mary Leigh
text: I spent a lot of time with a sales person from carID figuring out exactly what type of front license plate frame would fit my car's front bumper. Waited 6 days for it to show up. It was the WRONG product and would not fit my bumper. When I called to return it - I found out that I WOULD NOT RECEIVE A FULL REFUND. They would take the shipping charges and then some. So my $32+ cost was only credited $19+. All because their "expert" sales person who spent so much time with me STILL couldn't sent me the correct part. That should not be my problem or expense. Do not buy or trust anyone from carID. It will cost you$$!
